content:
The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the loss of Russians in the last day, as well as their total losses since the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

The data released the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 21.

The losses of Russians are:

  • personnel - 433 840 (+750) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6828 (+4)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13 074 (+16)
  • artillery systems - 10 740 (+26)
  • RSW - 1018 (+1)
  • air defense facilities - 721 (1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8365 (+10)
  • Winged missiles - 1922 (0)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14 242 (+44)
  • Special equipment - 1741 (+3).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!
title: Minus 750 invaders, 16 BBM and 26 Artisystems were destroyed: RF loss per day
description: The data released the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 21. The losses of Russians are: ...
author: Army Inform
